channel.title: Opportunities to Play! Games with Open Seats Available 3/24 thru 3/31
channel.description:
Hey folks!
In this post, we will highlight games for the upcoming week which have open seats and therefore the opportunity to add some more gaming fun to your week.
### [Community Radio](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_nEZThIN0blEcPXTJw) [date=2019-03-26 time=11:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-03-26 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] If you are interested in darkly comic improv about isolated communities ala [Welcome To Night Vale](https://www.welcometonightvale.com/) then you might want to join @Asher and company for this GM-full game!
### [ Dead Scare: Pittsburgh 1953 (Session 2 of 2)](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LVv7m83EVCwNYm2Adjt) [date=2019-03-28 time=19:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-03-28 time=22:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] It's the 1950's in the United States. Things are changing rapidly, especially for these Pittsburgh housewives who now are forced to protect all they love against the oncoming zombie hordes.

item.title: Opportunities to Play! Games with Open Seats Available 3/24 thru 3/31
item.dc:creator: @shane
item.description:
@shane wrote:

Cthulhu Dark: Mister Corbitt

Tuesday, March 26, 2019 7:00 PM → Tuesday, March 26, 2019 11:00 PM
What could possibly be amiss at the well liked Mister Corbitt’s home in 1990’s suburban England?

Read full topic
item.source: Opportunities to Play! Games with Open Seats Available 3/24 thru 3/31

item.title: Opportunities to Play! Games with Open Seats Available 3/24 thru 3/31

item.description:
@shane wrote:

Hey folks!

In this post, we will highlight games for the upcoming week which have open seats and therefore the opportunity to add some more gaming fun to your week.

Community Radio

Tuesday, March 26, 2019 3:00 PM → Tuesday, March 26, 2019 5:00 PM
If you are interested in darkly comic improv about isolated communities ala Welcome To Night Vale then you might want to join @Asher and company for this GM-full game!

Dead Scare: Pittsburgh 1953 (Session 2 of 2)

Thursday, March 28, 2019 11:00 PM → Friday, March 29, 2019 2:00 AM
It’s the 1950’s in the United States. Things are changing rapidly, especially for these Pittsburgh housewives who now are forced to protect all they love against the oncoming zombie hordes.
